summary: Certain DOD components are required by law to communicate to Congress about "unfunded priorities" that were not included in the President's annual budget request. Our review found that 18 DOD components submitted a total of $134 billion in unfunded priorities above the President's budget request for fiscal years 2020-2025. During that timeframe, the annual amount grew from $14.7 billion to $30 billion. Five components also...
title: Defense Budget: DOD Should Address All Statutory Elements for Unfunded Priorities
